column2: laughter and lusciousness!! From hand-crafted cocktails to delectable dishes all scattered
column3: smothered and covered in Terry's Southern Hospitality....you cannot go wrong!! He took the time to tailor drink recommendations to each individual's tastes. His intimate knowledges of each menu item left me sad I couldn't consume one of everything. This was a great dining experience I look forward to partaking in again...and again.
